name.en: Business Data Analysis with AI Applications

remark.ch: 胡中興教授授課。BA7126、FM5005、EC5033、IE8011合班上課

goal.en: With Python-programming skills, students will learn how to use concepts and techniques from both Data Analysis and Machine Learning algorithms for data-centric AI modeling in Business Strategies and Analyses.
goal.ch: With Python-programming skills, students will learn how to use concepts and techniques from both Data Analysis and Machine Learning algorithms for data-centric AI modeling in Business Strategies and Analyses.

content.en:
1 ( / ) Course Introduction
2 ( / ) Basics of Python Data Structure
3 ( / ) Python Data Preprocessing with Examples
4 ( / ) Python Data Visualization with Examples
5 ( / ) Exploratory Data Analysis – Concepts and Applications
6 ( / ) Introduction to Machine Learning
7 ( / ) Supervized Learning – Regression Models with Examples
8 ( / ) Supervized Learning – Classification Models with Examples
9 ( / ) Midterm Project (Individual)
10 ( / ) Unsupervized Learning – Clustering ＆amp; Dimensionality Reduction
11 ( / ) Feature Engineering – Feature Selection with Applications
12 ( / ) Best-Model Selection
13 ( / ) [Case Study 1] : Moneyball Strategy
14 ( / ) [Case Study 2] : Classification Models – Mobile Phone Pricing
15 ( / ) [Case Study 3] : Regression Models – House Pricing
16 ( / ) [Case Study 4] : Stock Prediction – Time-series Forecasting
17 ( / ) [Case Study 5] : Netflix Recommendation System
18 ( / ) Final Project Presentation

textbook.en: [Ref] : Jake VanderPlas, “Python Data Science Handbook — Essential Tools for Working with Data”, O＆#39;Reilly Media, 2017. (https://jakevdp.github.io/PythonDataScienceHandbook/)

grading.en: Assignment (作業) 30 ％ Midterm Project (Individual) 20 ％ Final Project ＆ Presentation 50 ％
